content:
Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft lime_wool, I need to first craft lime_dye which requires placing 1 green_dye and 1 white_dye side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the green_dye from slot 32 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the green_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the lime_dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft lime_wool, I need to combine 1 lime_dye and 1 white_wool in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move 1 lime_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]
thought: Since lime_dye has been placed in the crafting grid, I will now move 1 white_wool from slot 13 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the lime_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
